channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report X-2024060524
item.description:
Report X-2024060524

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-07
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: This package contained 4 bottles of Xylene and 2 of the caps were loose and 1 gallon of the content spilled. According to the SDS, this is a hazmat but the package had no markings of any kind. I will upload pictures of all 4 sides of the box including the content.
